data: MDGNN Xu et al. (2024)
Multi-relational graph including industry and institutional connections
Hierarchical graph embedding with ALIBI positional encoding
IC improvement: 15% (CSI300) Higher performance on large datasets
MASTER Li et al. (2024b)
Dynamic modeling of stock correlation through alternating attention
Market-driven gating mechanism for feature selection
Ranking metrics: +13% Portfolio metrics: +47% (CSI300, CSI800)
DoubleAdapt Zhao et al. (2023)
Double adaptation for distribution shifts in streaming data
Multi-head transformer layers for feature and label adaptation
Consistent improvement across all implementations LSTM, GRU, Transformer Model-independent adaptation
DPA-STIFormer Yan and Tan (2024)
Feature-oriented temporal modeling
Two-path mechanism with adaptive gating
Superior performance on CSI500, CSI1000, NASDAQ, NYSE Improved IC and Sharpe Ratio
DANSMP Zhao et al. (2022)
Market knowledge graph at the management level
Dual attention network for complex entity interactions
Return: 16.97% Sharpe Ratio: 4.628 (CSI300E)
GINN Xu et al. (2024)
Integration of GARCH theory with neural networks
GARCH-based regularization in the LSTM loss function
Consistent superiority on 7 global indices. High performance in zero-shot mode
DIFFSTOCK Daiya et al. (2024)
Diffusion models for market forecasting
Adaptive noise schedule for stock volatility
Sharpe Ratio improvement: NYSE: +7.92% NASDAQ: +6.18%
Wang et al. (2024b)
LLM integration for news processing
Textual transformation of numerical forecasting
Superior performance during event-driven market shifts. Multi-domain applicability
